version_description:
Simplified connectivity. Connecting to your Go-tcha made simpler.
New Feature that records some of your capture activity.
Enhanced interface with a new dark theme.

Anonymously compare your catching skills with the Go-tcha community. This can be enabled in the settings screen.
Disable auto catch animations to help save battery power and extend your Go-tcha playing time. Thank you to neo884514 for the suggestion.
New firmware to improve support for auto stops (v6.0).

Thanks to all the users that have enabled community compare. Since analysing the data we have noticed some inconsistencies. With this update the results should be more accurate. Statistics will only be calculated from this new app version 2.2.

Improved connecting and syncing reliability after starting the app from the background. Thanks to steelmanbwk for feedback regarding this issue.
Universal app to fix layout problems on iPad.
Fixed a crash bug if using with a new Go-tcha. Sorry for any inconvenience.
Updated to comply with App Store privacy rules.
